snippet.textDisplay:
@Retrauk
Seriously!  It is true--  (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baba_Yetu)   Just a Fun Fact.
Baba yetu, yetu uliye
Mbinguni yetu, yetu amina!
Baba yetu yetu uliye
M jina lako e litukuzwe.
Utupe leo chakula chetu
Tunachohitaji, utusamehe
Makosa yetu, hey!
Kama nasi tunavyowasamehe
Waliotukosea usitutie
Katika majaribu, lakini
Utuokoe, na yule, muovu e milele!
Ufalme wako ufike utakalo
Lifanyike duniani kama mbinguni.
(Amina)
Our Father, who art
in Heaven. Amen!
Our Father,
Hallowed be thy name.
Give us this day our daily bread,
Forgive us of
our trespasses,
As we forgive others
Who trespass against us
Lead us not into temptation, but
deliver us from the evil one forever.
Thy kingdom come, thy will be done
On Earth as it is in Heaven.
(Amen)
snippet.textOriginal:
@Retrauk
Seriously!  It is true--  (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baba_Yetu)   Just a Fun Fact.
Baba yetu, yetu uliye
Mbinguni yetu, yetu amina!
Baba yetu yetu uliye
M jina lako e litukuzwe.
Utupe leo chakula chetu
Tunachohitaji, utusamehe
Makosa yetu, hey!
Kama nasi tunavyowasamehe
Waliotukosea usitutie
Katika majaribu, lakini
Utuokoe, na yule, muovu e milele!
Ufalme wako ufike utakalo
Lifanyike duniani kama mbinguni.
(Amina)
Our Father, who art
in Heaven. Amen!
Our Father,
Hallowed be thy name.
Give us this day our daily bread,
Forgive us of
our trespasses,
As we forgive others
Who trespass against us
Lead us not into temptation, but
deliver us from the evil one forever.
Thy kingdom come, thy will be done
On Earth as it is in Heaven.
(Amen)

snippet.textDisplay: Me too! Except Three years ago for me. It was a night of Dreams come True for me . Heard One Winged Angel, Time Scar. One of the most memorable and best nights of my life. I only wish they could have played Liberi Fatali, and the night would have been perfect, but alas, hearing those two songs alone with a live Choir and Orchestra was mind blowing!
snippet.textOriginal: Me too! Except Three years ago for me. It was a night of Dreams come True for me . Heard One Winged Angel, Time Scar. One of the most memorable and best nights of my life. I only wish they could have played Liberi Fatali, and the night would have been perfect, but alas, hearing those two songs alone with a live Choir and Orchestra was mind blowing!

snippet.textDisplay:
It´s so simple!
Our Father, who art in heaven,
Hallowed be thy Name.
Thy kingdom come.
Thy will be done,
On earth as it is in heaven.
Give us this day our daily bread.
And forgive us our trespasses,
As we forgive those who trespass against us.
And lead us not into temptation,
But deliver us from evil.
[For thine is the kingdom,
and the power, and the glory,
for ever and ever.]
Amen.
snippet.textOriginal:
It´s so simple!
Our Father, who art in heaven,
Hallowed be thy Name.
Thy kingdom come.
Thy will be done,
On earth as it is in heaven.
Give us this day our daily bread.
And forgive us our trespasses,
As we forgive those who trespass against us.
And lead us not into temptation,
But deliver us from evil.
[For thine is the kingdom,
and the power, and the glory,
for ever and ever.]
Amen.

snippet.textDisplay:
Baba Yetu is Composed by Christopher Tin, performed by Stanford Talisman.

The text is supposed to be "The Lord's Prayer" in Swahili, slighly adjusted in order to sound better. Shouldn't be too hard to find the lyrics with that info :-)
snippet.textOriginal:
Baba Yetu is Composed by Christopher Tin, performed by Stanford Talisman.

The text is supposed to be "The Lord's Prayer" in Swahili, slighly adjusted in order to sound better. Shouldn't be too hard to find the lyrics with that info :-)

snippet.textDisplay: Sounyoma, Meier is one of the 4X genre's most important and well known leaders. Just because you are ignorant of his work doesn't mean that his position was or is at all irrelevant. He has brought out several cult classics and served to flesh out and bring life to the 4X genre as a whole. In summation, learn your shit.
snippet.textOriginal: Sounyoma, Meier is one of the 4X genre's most important and well known leaders.
